column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I'm not normally a huge steak eater but the filet I had at Bavette's changed my thoughts. I now know that I like steak
column2: I just only like steak to the level of quality at Bavette's. Go ahead
column3: call me a snob if you must. The complimentary chocolate cake (which is definitely sized to share) at the end was the cherry on top. If nothing else
column4: the atmosphere and interior design will mesmerize you through out your meal. Lastly
column5: our server Sean Patrick Harris and the manager Matt Christensen offered sincere and warm world-class service from beginning to end. Bavette's is well worth the wait and money if you enjoy truly fine dining experiences.
